data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements en editor especially designed for
    configuration files, it is heavily inspired from the editor in
    cfengine. There's also an executable, update-cfe, that uses
    Config::Cfe and is useful in shell scripts.

    I think the chapterid is 'string processing', that's what the
    module really do.

    By the way, the name was discussed, could have been on
    modules@perl.org, a long time ago.
